name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitOwl - Open Source Insights At a Glance

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitOwl provides a sidebar with contextual insights to help you navigate the world of open source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover similar repositories
- Search across all GitHub repositories with over 1000 stars
- Find semantically similar repositories (uses AI embeddings)
- Adjust your search with filters

Quickly understand and navigate any repository
- Recent changes in activity (commits, issues, PRs, releases)
- Top issues
- Most popular forks
- Quick access to PRs & releases

Get a breakdown of any user's activity
- Recent change in activity
- Actions grouped by repositories
- Details for any recent pull request or issue contribution
- Latest stars

GitOwl works on:
- GitHub - https://github.com/
- npmjs - https://www.npmjs.com/
- PyPI - https://pypi.org/

Privacy
- Extension only uses the repository or user name to provide insights
- Extension does not store or collect any other data from the webpages you visit

GitOwl extension is open source, source code available at: https://github.com/dhilman/gitowl-extension
